title: Event Title Here
description: Detailed description of the event, what will be covered, who should attend, and key takeaways
_time_note: Include timezone, e.g., '3:00 PM - 5:00 PM IST' or '10:00 AM EST'

venue_details.meeting_link: Will be shared with registered participants
venue_details.address: If physical venue, add full address here

_max_attendees_note: Maximum number of participants, use null for unlimited
_registration_deadline_format: YYYY-MM-DD - Usually a day before the event
_is_featured_note: Set to true to highlight this event prominently
_is_active_note: Set to true to make event visible, false to hide it
_display_note: Set to true to show on frontend, false to hide from public but keep in admin
_tags_note: Add relevant tags for categorization and search

speaker_info.name: Speaker Name
speaker_info.bio: Brief bio of the speaker with relevant experience

agenda.description: Deep dive into the core topic

_what_to_bring_note: Optional: List of items attendees should bring
_benefits_note: Key takeaways and benefits for attendees

custom_questions: What do you hope to learn from this event?
How did you hear about us?

_instructions.1: Fill in all fields without underscore prefix
_instructions.2: Fields with underscore prefix (like _note) are just for guidance - don't include them in final JSON
_instructions.3: Remove any optional sections you don't need
_instructions.4: Ensure date is in YYYY-MM-DD format
_instructions.5: Keep display=true to show event publicly, false to hide
_instructions.6: Set is_featured=true for important events to highlight them
_instructions.7: Save this as 'new_event.json' and share it for processing
